entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
